translations.text: Ṭâ-Sĩn-Mĩm.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ta-seen-meem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: These are the verses of the clear Book.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tilka ayatu alkitabialmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Perhaps you ˹O Prophet˺ will grieve yourself to death over their disbelief.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LaAAallaka bakhiAAun nafsaka allayakoonoo mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ

translations.text: If We willed, We could send down upon them a ˹compelling˺ sign from the heavens, leaving their necks bent in ˹utter˺ submission to it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In nasha/ nunazzil AAalayhim mina assama-iayatan fathallat aAAnaquhum lahakhadiAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ

translations.text: Whatever new reminder comes to them from the Most Compassionate, they always turn away from it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ya/teehim min thikrin minaarrahmani muhdathin illa kanooAAanhu muAArideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.text: They have certainly denied ˹the truth˺, so they will soon face the consequences of their ridicule.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqad kaththaboo fasaya/teehim anbaoma kanoo bihi yastahzi-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.text: Have they failed to look at the earth, ˹to see˺ how many types of fine plants We have caused to grow in it?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yaraw ila al-ardi kamanbatna feeha min kulli zawjin kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when your Lord called out to Moses, “Go to the wrongdoing people—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith nada rabbukamoosa ani i/ti alqawma aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear ˹Allah˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qawma firAAawna ala yattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

translations.text: He replied, “My Lord! I fear that they will reject me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi innee akhafu anyukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ

translations.text: And ˹so˺ my heart will be broken and my tongue will be tied. So send Aaron along ˹as a messenger˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayadeequ sadree walayantaliqu lisanee faarsil ila haroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ

translations.text: Also, they have a charge against me,<sup foot_note=77083>1</sup> so I fear they may kill me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walahum AAalayya thanbun faakhafuan yaqtuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ

translations.text: Allah responded, “Certainly not! So go, both of you, with Our signs. We will be with you, listening.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kalla fathhababi-ayatina inna maAAakum mustamiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: Go to Pharaoh and say, ‘We are messengers from the Lord of all worlds,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa/tiya firAAawna faqoola innarasoolu rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹commanded to say:˺ ‘Let the Children of Israel go with us.’’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: An arsil maAAana banee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

translations.text: Pharaoh protested, “Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you stayed several years of your life in our care?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala alam nurabbika feenawaleedan walabithta feena min AAumurika sineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.text: Then you did what you did,<sup foot_note=77084>1</sup> being ˹utterly˺ ungrateful!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WafaAAalta faAAlataka allatee faAAaltawaanta mina alkafireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

translations.text: Moses replied, “I did it then, lacking guidance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala faAAaltuha ithanwaana mina addalleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.text: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me one of the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fafarartu minkum lamma khiftukumfawahaba lee rabbee hukman wajaAAalanee mina almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

translations.text: How can that be a ‘favour,’ of which you remind me, when ˹it was only because˺ you ˹have˺ enslaved the Children of Israel?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watilka niAAmatun tamunnuha AAalayyaan AAabbadta banee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Pharaoh asked, “And what is ‘the Lord of all worlds’?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala firAAawnu wama rabbu alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

translations.text: Moses replied, “˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbu assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma in kuntummooqineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Pharaoh said to those around him, “Did you hear ˹what he said˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala liman hawlahu alatastamiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Moses added, “˹He is˺ your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbukum warabbu aba-ikumual-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ

translations.text: Pharaoh said ˹mockingly˺, “Your messenger, who has been sent to you, must be insane.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala inna rasoolakumu allatheeorsila ilaykum lamajnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: Moses responded: “˹He is˺ the Lord of the east and west, and everything in between, if only you had any sense.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbu almashriqi walmaghribiwama baynahuma in kuntum taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ

translations.text: Pharaoh threatened, “If you take any other god besides me, I will certainly have you imprisoned.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala la-ini ittakhathta ilahanghayree laajAAalannaka mina almasjooneen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Moses responded, “Even if I bring you a clear proof?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala awa law ji/tuka bishay-in mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Pharaoh demanded, “Bring it then, if what you say is true.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fa/ti bihi in kunta mina assadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: So he threw down his staff and—behold!—it became a real snake.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faalqa AAasahu fa-ithahiya thuAAbanun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ

translations.text: Then he drew his hand ˹out of his collar˺ and it was ˹shining˺ white for all to see.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WanazaAAa yadahu fa-itha hiya baydaolinnathireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ

translations.text: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, “He is indeed a skilled magician,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lilmala-i hawlahu inna hathalasahirun AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ

translations.text: who seeks to drive you from your land by his magic. So what do you propose?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yureedu an yukhrijakum min ardikumbisihrihi famatha ta/muroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “Let him and his brother wait and dispatch mobilizers to all cities
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo arjih waakhahu wabAAathfee almada-ini hashireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: to bring you every skilled magician.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya/tooka bikulli sahharin AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So the magicians were assembled at the set time on the appointed day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FajumiAAa assaharatu limeeqatiyawmin maAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And the people were asked, “Will you join the gathering,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqeela linnasi hal antummujtamiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

translations.text: so that we may follow the magicians if they prevail?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LaAAallana nattabiAAu assaharatain kanoo humu alghalibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

translations.text: When the magicians came, they asked Pharaoh, “Shall we have a ˹suitable˺ reward if we prevail?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaa assaharatuqaloo lifirAAawna a-inna lana laajran in kunnanahnu alghalibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ

translation.text: the ones who are brought near

translations.text: He replied, “Yes, and you will then certainly be among those closest to me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala naAAam wa-innakum ithanlamina almuqarrabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ

translations.text: Moses said to them, “Cast whatever you wish to cast.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lahum moosa alqoo maantum mulqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

translations.text: So they cast down their ropes and staffs, saying, “By Pharaoh’s might, it is we who will surely prevail.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faalqaw hibalahum waAAisiyyahumwaqaloo biAAizzati firAAawna inna lanahnualghaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ

translations.text: Then Moses threw down his staff, and—behold!—it devoured the objects of their illusion!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faalqa moosa AAasahufa-itha hiya talqafu ma ya/fikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So the magicians fell down, prostrating.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faolqiya assaharatu sajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They declared, “We ˹now˺ believe in the Lord of all worlds—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo amanna birabbialAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: the Lord of Moses and Aaron.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi moosa waharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translation.text: and I will surely crucify you

translations.text: Pharaoh threatened, “How dare you believe in him before I give you permission? He must be your master who taught you magic, but soon you will see. I will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, then crucify you all.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athanalakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu assihrafalasawfa taAAlamoona laoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakummin khilafin walaosallibannakum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

translations.text: They responded, “˹That would be˺ no harm! Surely to our Lord we will ˹all˺ return.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo la dayra innaila rabbina munqaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: We really hope that our Lord will forgive our sins, as we are the first to believe.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna natmaAAu an yaghfira lanarabbuna khatayana an kunnaawwala almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

translations.text: And We inspired Moses, ˹saying,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waawhayna ila moosaan asri biAAibadee innakum muttabaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then Pharaoh sent mobilizers to all cities,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faarsala firAAawnu fee almada-ini hashireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹and said,˺ “These ˹outcasts˺ are just a handful of people,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna haola-i lashirthimatunqaleeloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: who have really enraged us,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahum lana lagha-ithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: but we are all on the alert.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lajameeAAun hathiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So We lured the tyrants<sup foot_note=77085>1</sup> out of ˹their˺ gardens, springs,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhrajnahum min jannatinwaAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: treasures, and splendid residences.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakunoozin wamaqamin kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We caused to inherit them

translations.text: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to the Children of Israel.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika waawrathnahabanee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And so they pursued them at sunrise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaatbaAAoohum mushriqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ

translations.text: When the two groups came face to face, the companions of Moses cried out, “We are overtaken for sure.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma taraa aljamAAaniqala as-habu moosa innalamudrakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

translations.text: Moses reassured ˹them˺, “Absolutely not! My Lord is certainly with me—He will guide me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kalla inna maAAiya rabbeesayahdeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.text: So We inspired Moses: “Strike the sea with your staff,” and the sea was split, each part was like a huge mountain.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faawhayna ila moosaani idrib biAAasaka albahra fanfalaqafakana kullu firqin kattawdi alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We drew the pursuers to that place,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waazlafna thamma al-akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and delivered Moses and those with him all together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanjayna moosa waman maAAahuajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then We drowned the others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma aghraqna al-akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Relate to them ˹O Prophet˺ the story of Abraham,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watlu AAalayhim nabaa ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.text: when he questioned his father and his people, “What is that you worship ˹besides Allah˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala li-abeehi waqawmihi mataAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “We worship idols, to which we are fully devoted.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo naAAbudu asnamanfanathallu laha AAakifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Abraham asked, “Can they hear you when you call upon them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hal yasmaAAoonakum ithtadAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Or can they benefit or harm you?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aw yanfaAAoonakum aw yadurroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ

translations.text: They replied, “No! But we found our forefathers doing the same.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bal wajadna abaanakathalika yafAAaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Abraham responded, “Have you ˹really˺ considered what you have been worshipping—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala afaraaytum ma kuntumtaAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: you and your ancestors?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Antum waabaokumu al-aqdamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: They are ˹all˺ enemies to me, except the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innahum AAaduwwun lee illa rabbaalAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹He is˺ the One Who created me, and He ˹alone˺ guides me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee khalaqanee fahuwa yahdeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹He is˺ the One Who provides me with food and drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallathee huwa yutAAimuneewayasqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He ˹alone˺ heals me when I am sick.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha maridtu fahuwayashfeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He ˹is the One Who˺ will cause me to die, and then bring me back to life.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallathee yumeetunee thummayuhyeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.text: And He is ˹the One˺ Who, I hope, will forgive my flaws<sup foot_note=77086>1</sup> on Judgment Day.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallathee atmaAAu anyaghfira lee khatee-atee yawma addeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.text: “My Lord! Grant me wisdom, and join me with the righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi hab lee hukman waalhiqneebissaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.text: Bless me with honourable mention among later generations.<sup foot_note=77087>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajAAal lee lisana sidqinfee al-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Make me one of those awarded the Garden of Bliss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajAAalnee min warathati jannati annaAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

translations.text: Forgive my father, for he is certainly one of the misguided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waghfir li-abee innahu kanamina addalleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And do not disgrace me on the Day all will be resurrected—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala tukhzinee yawma yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ

translations.text: the Day when neither wealth nor children will be of any benefit.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma la yanfaAAu malun walabanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

translations.text: Only those who come before Allah with a pure heart ˹will be saved˺.”<sup foot_note=77088>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man ata Allahabiqalbin saleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹On that Day˺ Paradise will be brought near to the God-fearing,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the Hellfire will be displayed to the deviant.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waburrizati aljaheemu lilghaween
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.text: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqeela lahum ayna ma kuntumtaAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ

translations.text: besides Allah? Can they help you or even help themselves?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Min dooni Allahi hal yansuroonakumaw yantasiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then the idols will be hurled headlong into Hell, along with the deviant
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakubkiboo feeha hum walghawoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the soldiers of Iblîs,<sup foot_note=77089>1</sup> all together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajunoodu ibleesa ajmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: There the deviant will cry while disputing with their idols,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo wahum feeha yakhtasimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: “By Allah! We were clearly mistaken,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tallahi in kunna lafeedalalin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: when we made you equal to the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith nusawweekum birabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And none led us astray other than the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama adallana illaalmujrimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now we have none to intercede for us,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama lana min shafiAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: nor a close friend.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala sadeeqin hameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: If only we could have a second chance, then we would be believers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falaw anna lana karratan fanakoonamina almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The people of Noah rejected the messengers<sup foot_note=77090>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat qawmu noohinalmursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: when their brother Noah said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala lahum akhoohum noohunala tattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So fear Allah, and obey me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fattaqoo Allaha waateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So fear Allah, and obey me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fattaqoo Allaha waateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They argued, “How can we believe in you, when you are followed ˹only˺ by the lowest of the low?”<sup foot_note=77091>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo anu/minu laka wattabaAAakaal-arthaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: He responded, “And what knowledge do I have of what they do?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala wama AAilmee bimakanoo yaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ

translations.text: Their judgment is with my Lord, if you had any sense!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In hisabuhum illa AAalarabbee law tashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I am not going to expel the believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ana bitaridialmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I am only sent with a clear warning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In ana illa natheerunmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ

translations.text: They threatened, “If you do not desist, O  Noah, you will surely be stoned ˹to death˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo la-in lam tantahi yanoohu latakoonanna mina almarjoomeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Noah prayed, “My Lord! My people have truly rejected me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi inna qawmee kaththaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: So judge between me and them decisively, and save me and the believers with me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faftah baynee wabaynahum fathanwanajjinee waman maAAiya mina almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

translations.text: So We saved him and those with him in the fully loaded Ark.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faanjaynahu waman maAAahu feealfulki almashhoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma aghraqna baAAdu albaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The people of ’Âd rejected the messengers
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat AAadun almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: when their brother Hûd said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala lahum akhoohumhoodun ala tattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

translations.text: and construct castles, as if you are going to live forever,

translations.text: Fattaqoo Allaha waateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Fear the One Who has provided you with ˹the good˺ things you know:

translations.text: Wattaqoo allathee amaddakumbima taAAlamoon

translations.text: He provided you with cattle, and children,

translations.text: Amaddakum bi-anAAamin wabaneen

translations.text: and gardens, and springs.

translations.text: Wajannatin waAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.text: Innee akhafu AAalaykum AAathabayawmin AAatheem

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ

translations.text: They responded, “It is all the same to us whether you warn ˹us˺ or not.

translations.text: Qaloo sawaon AAalaynaawaAAathta am lam takun mina alwaAAitheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: This is simply the tradition of our predecessors.

translations.text: In hatha illa khuluqual-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And we will never be punished.”

translations.text: Wama nahnu bimuAAaththabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: So they rejected him, and ˹so˺ We destroyed them. Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

translations.text: to carve homes in the mountains with great skill?

translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

translations.text: Was it not sufficient proof for the deniers that it has been recognized by the knowledgeable among the Children of Israel?<sup foot_note=77096>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yakun lahum ayatan anyaAAlamahu AAulamao banee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Had We revealed it to a non-Arab,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw nazzalnahu AAala baAAdial-aAAjameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: who would then recite it to the deniers ˹in fluent Arabic˺, still they would not have believed in it!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqaraahu AAalayhim ma kanoobihi mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: This is how We allow denial ˹to steep˺ into the hearts of the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika salaknahu feequloobi almujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

translations.text: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yu/minoona bihi hattayarawoo alAAathaba al-aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And it will come to them

translations.text: which will take them by surprise when they least expect ˹it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faya/tiyahum baghtatan wahum layashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then they will cry, “Can we be allowed more time?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fayaqooloo hal nahnu muntharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: So is it for Our punishment

translations.text: Do they ˹really˺ seek to hasten Our torment?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AfabiAAathabina yastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Imagine ˹O Prophet˺ if We allowed them enjoyment for years,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaraayta in mattaAAnahum sineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then there came to them what they had been threatened with:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma jaahum ma kanooyooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ

translations.text: would that enjoyment be of any benefit to them ˹at all˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma aghna AAanhum ma kanooyumattaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

translations.text: We have never destroyed a society without warners
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illalaha munthiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: to remind ˹them˺, for We would never wrong ˹anyone˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thikra wama kunnathalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: It was not the devils who brought this ˹Quran˺ down:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama tanazzalat bihi ashshayateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: it is not for them ˹to do so˺, nor can they,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yanbaghee lahum wamayastateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: for they are strictly barred from ˹even˺ overhearing ˹it˺.<sup foot_note=77097>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum AAani assamAAilamaAAzooloona
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ

translations.text: So do not ever call upon any other god besides Allah, or you will be one of the punished.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala tadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara fatakoona mina almuAAaththabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And warn ˹all, starting with˺ your closest relatives,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanthir AAasheerataka al-aqrabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: and be gracious to the believers who follow you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakhfid janahakalimani ittabaAAaka mina almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: But if they disobey you, say, “I am certainly free of what you do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-in AAasawka faqul innee baree-onmimma taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Put your trust in the Almighty, Most Merciful,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watawakkal AAala alAAazeezi arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Who sees you when you rise ˹for prayer at night˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee yaraka heenataqoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: as well as your movements ˹in prayer˺ along with ˹fellow˺ worshippers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wataqallubaka fee assajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He ˹alone˺ is indeed the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu huwa assameeAAu alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ

translations.text: Shall I inform you of whom the devils ˹actually˺ descend upon?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal onabbi-okum AAala man tanazzaluashshayateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They descend upon every sinful liar,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tanazzalu AAala kulli affakinatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: who gives an ˹attentive˺ ear ˹to half-truths˺, mostly passing on sheer lies.<sup foot_note=77098>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yulqoona assamAAa waaktharuhum kathiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: As for poets, they are followed ˹merely˺ by deviants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WashshuAAaraoyattabiAAuhumu alghawoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ

translations.text: Do you not see how they rant in every field,<sup foot_note=77099>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam tara annahum fee kulli wadinyaheemoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: only saying what they never do?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahum yaqooloona ma layafAAaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ

translations.text: Except those who believe, do good, remember Allah often, and ˹poetically˺ avenge ˹the believers˺ after being wrongfully slandered. The wrongdoers will come to know what ˹evil˺ end they will meet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati wathakaroo Allahakatheeran wantasaroo min baAAdi ma thulimoowasayaAAlamu allatheena thalamoo ayyamunqalabin yanqaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
